data.name: ReadDebtDebtDetail
data.value: select T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OB_TRN_ID, T1.OB_TRN_TYP, T1.DEBT_TYP, T1.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_SUP_TYPE, T1.OTY_TYPE, T2.DUE_DT, T2.BAL_DUE_AMT, T2.INT_BAL_DUE_AMT from CKT_OB_TRN T1 join CKT_DEBT_DTL T2 on (@otyType = T1.OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (T1.DEBT_TYP = 'D') and (T1.OTY_TYPE = T2.OTY_TYPE) and (T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T1.OB_TRN_TYP = T2.OTR_TYPE) and (T1.OB_TRN_ID = T2.OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (T1.CPA_TYPE = T2.CPA_TYPE) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and ( (T2.BAL_DUE_AMT > 0) or (T2.INT_BAL_DUE_AMT > 0) )

data.name: ReadObligationObligationType
data.value: select T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID, T2.DEBT_TYP_CD, T2.DEBT_TYP_CLASS from CKT_OB_TYPE T2 join CKT_OBLIGATION T1 on (@cpaType = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.DEBT_TYP_ID = T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.DEBT_TYP_CLASS = 'R') order by T1.OB_ID

data.name: ReadObligor
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber

data.name: ReadRecaptureInclusion
data.value: select top(1) OTY_TYPE, OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, RECAP_INCL_SYSID, DISCONTINUE_DATE, EFFECTIVE_DATE from CKT_RECAPTR_INCLSN where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE > @effectiveDate)
